key.name: enable-xwayland
key.description: If set to true, XWayland support is enabled.

key.name: window-action-key
key.summary: Modifier to use for extended window management operations
key.description:
This key is used for extended window management operations, for example dragging windows from the contents rather than their decoration.
The default is intended to be the "Windows" key on PC hardware or the "Command" key on Mac hardware.
